message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can adjust in the next round if you'd prefer.
That's not a fair start, Alice. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Let's be reasonable and avoid this dragging on.
Okay, let's compromise. I'll take a bit less, but a 65/35 split in my favor is fair considering inflation.  Let's reach an agreement before things get worse.
This isn't going anywhere, Alice. I'm being more than fair with a 55/45 split considering the time pressure. Let's just settle this now.
We're getting closer. I'll meet you halfway on the last offer. Let's both take a little less to avoid the risk of getting nothing.
